about_the_game:
The Satisfactory Soundtrack, with its luscious ear massaging synths, is the perfect musical companion for exploring alien planets and achieving maximum efficiency!

Almost 4 hours of FICSIT approved music have been thoughtfully composed and mixed by Jannik Reuterberg, aka “Dream Thing”, to let time fly by in the blink of an eye. It contains a total of 46 tracks divided over two disks in both MP3 and FLAC format.
